text: Samuel Mathias (born 23 December 1996) is a Nigerian international footballer who plays for Lobi Stars, as a midfielder. ==Career== He has played club football for Gombe United and Kano Pillars. He made his international debut for Nigeria in 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigeria international footballers Category:Gombe United F.C. players Category:Kano Pillars F.C. players Category:El-Kanemi Warriors F.C. players Category:Lobi Stars F.C. players Category:Akwa United F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Samuel Mathias
